languages.text: "Я нашел себе замену. "Руолдо" захотел поиграться властью — и я ему великодушно позволил. Жаль, правил он недолго". {n}В ехидном смешке Блефа — ни намека на сочувствие.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Я нашел себе замену. "Руолдо" захотел поиграться властью — и я ему великодушно позволил. Жаль, правил он недолго. А вот я... сменил костюмчик, заняв место наблюдателя. Наловчился острословить. И даже вошел во вкус".

languages.text: "I found a replacement. 'Ruoldo' wanted to play at power, and I graciously let him. Shame he didn't rule for long. {n} Bluff's jeering laughter carries no hint of pity.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я нашел себе замену. "Руолдо" захотел поиграться властью — и я ему великодушно позволил. Жаль, правил он недолго". {n}В ехидном смешке Блефа — ни намека на сочувствие.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I found a replacement. 'Ruoldo' wanted to play at power, and I graciously let him. Pity he didn't rule for long. {n} Bluff's jeering laughter carries no hint of pity.{/n}
"I found a replacement. 'Ruoldo' wanted to play at power, and I graciously let him. Shame he didn't rule for long. {n} Bluff's jeering laughter carries no hint of pity.{/n}

"I found a replacement. 'Ruoldo' wanted to play at power, and I graciously let him. Pity he didn't rule for long. I, on the other hand, had a costume change and took a seat among the spectators. I sharpened my wit. I even began to enjoy it."

languages.text: “我找到了个替代品。‘罗尔多’想玩权力的游戏，而我仁慈地允许他玩。真遗憾，他在位子上没坐多久。”{n}闹闹刻薄地大笑起来，语气中没有一丝怜悯的意味。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I found a replacement. 'Ruoldo' wanted to play at power, and I graciously let him. Shame he didn't rule for long. {n} Bluff's jeering laughter carries no hint of pity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我找到了个替代品。‘罗尔多’想玩权力的游戏，而我仁慈地允许他玩。真遗憾，他在位子上没坐多久。”{n}闹闹刻薄地大笑起来，语气中没有一丝怜悯的意味。{/n}

languages.text: «Encontré un sustituto. "Ruoldo" quería jugar al juego del poder, y yo tuve a bien permitírselo. Lástima que su reinado no durase mucho. {n}La risa de Farol no guarda lástima alguna.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I found a replacement. 'Ruoldo' wanted to play at power, and I graciously let him. Shame he didn't rule for long. {n} Bluff's jeering laughter carries no hint of pity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Encontré un sustituto. "Ruoldo" quería jugar al juego del poder, y yo tuve a bien permitírselo. Lástima que su reinado no durase mucho. {n}La risa de Farol no guarda lástima alguna.{/n}

languages.text: "Bir yedek buldum. 'Ruoldo', güç oyunu oynamak istedi ve ona nezaketle izin verdim. Uzun süre hüküm sürmemesi yazık oldu." {n}Kurusıkı'nın alaycı kahkahasında merhametten eser yok.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I found a replacement. 'Ruoldo' wanted to play at power, and I graciously let him. Shame he didn't rule for long. {n} Bluff's jeering laughter carries no hint of pity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bir yedek buldum. 'Ruoldo', güç oyunu oynamak istedi ve ona nezaketle izin verdim. Uzun süre hüküm sürmemesi yazık oldu." {n}Kurusıkı'nın alaycı kahkahasında merhametten eser yok.{/n}

languages.text: 「俺は身代わりを見つけた。『ルオルド』は権力を持ちたがっていたので、ご丁寧にそうさせた。可哀想に、彼の統治は長くはなかった。一方で、俺は慣習を変え、観衆の中に紛れた。俺は知恵を磨き、それを楽しみ始めさえした」
languages.original_text: "I found a replacement. 'Ruoldo' wanted to play at power, and I graciously let him. Pity he didn't rule for long. I, on the other hand, had a costume change and took a seat among the spectators. I sharpened my wit. I even began to enjoy it."

traits.locale_text: 「俺は身代わりを見つけた。『ルオルド』は権力を持ちたがっていたので、ご丁寧にそうさせた。可哀想に、彼の統治は長くはなかった。一方で、俺は慣習を変え、観衆の中に紛れた。俺は知恵を磨き、それを楽しみ始めさえした」

languages.text: « J'ai trouvé un remplaçant. "Ruoldo" voulait jouer à celui qui a du pouvoir, alors je lui en ai donné l'occasion. Dommage qu'il n'ait pas régné longtemps... » {n}Le rire moqueur de Bluff ne contient pas la moindre pitié.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I found a replacement. 'Ruoldo' wanted to play at power, and I graciously let him. Shame he didn't rule for long. {n} Bluff's jeering laughter carries no hint of pity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « J'ai trouvé un remplaçant. "Ruoldo" voulait jouer à celui qui a du pouvoir, alors je lui en ai donné l'occasion. Dommage qu'il n'ait pas régné longtemps... » {n}Le rire moqueur de Bluff ne contient pas la moindre pitié.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich habe einen Ersatz gefunden. 'Ruoldo' wollte den Mächtigen spielen, und ich ließ ihn gnädig gewähren. Ein Jammer, dass er nicht lange regiert hat. {n} In Bluffs fröhlichem Lachen ist keine Spur von Reue zu erkennen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I found a replacement. 'Ruoldo' wanted to play at power, and I graciously let him. Shame he didn't rule for long. {n} Bluff's jeering laughter carries no hint of pity.{/n}
